items.sentence: He is in desperate search of further evidence.
She watched the children playing in the brook.
I can't reach the things on the highest shelf.
Tom and Mary are starting to get on my nerves.
If Tom hadn't done it, somebody else would've.
The fastest way to get there is by snowmobile.
If we win this lottery, we'll be set for life.
Tom never discusses politics with his friends.
I didn't come here to listen to this nonsense.
Tell me why you didn't go to school yesterday.
